title: our kauai trip
name: our kauai trip
description:
A Map by Jason

add stuff for us to go look at, i'll be watching this map on my phone, include good direction when possible

properties.name: Farmer's Market
properties.description: Posted by HappycowTown Park (Kauai), Hanapepe, Hawaii, United States, North AmericaVegetarian FriendlyHealth Food StoreReviews

properties.name: Kipu Falls
properties.description: Posted by DeisnorRight around here there is a small dirt road which leads down an overgrown very narrow path to an oasis of waterfalls, cliff jumping, a rope swing and general swimming hole discovery bliss.

properties.name: Lydgate State Park
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor One of the best ever playgrounds nestled against a drift wood abundant kid friendly beach. Sweet state park and the play structure includes a cave, lots of a climbing, a tornado slide and lots more.

properties.name: Nepali Coast Lookout
properties.description: Posted by JasonTabor and Sabin found a cute little lizard, played hide and seek in a hobbit tree and lunched on home-made sushi ala jake and michelle. Hot sun and cold mist intermixed for an interesting sensation. So much fog, we could barely see down to the coastline, but for one moment of stunning clarity, making it very much worth the drive.

properties.name: Sand Kids
properties.description: Posted by System 2360 Kiahuna Plantation Dr # K21, Koloa, HISand Kids (808) 742-2288

properties.name: Sheraton Kauai
properties.description: Posted by Deisnor2440 Hoonani Road, Koloa, HISheraton Kauai offers a children’s day camp for children 3 (must be potty trained) to 12 years of age. This program is open to the public. Calls 808-742-1661. The kids had a blast! This was Tabors first drop off experience and he loved every moment of it. Emiko got to stay all day and even go on the water slide and practice swimming. Both kids went fishing and caught Tilapia. Was a blast.

properties.name: Snorkeling with the Giant Turtles
properties.description: Posted by JasonDi-Ann tapped my shoulder and pointed down, a huge sea turtle zoomed under our legs. I was able to keep abreast of him for about 5 minutes, but he was headed towards the surfers, and i wasn\'t ready to dodge boards quite yet. It was really amazing, these turtles are huge.

properties.name: Stuffed animal altar
properties.description: Posted by Jasondozens of plushies strung up along a chain link fence, directly across the street from the giant thrift store barn.

properties.name: Sunshine Farmers' Market at Kaloa
properties.description: Posted by DaveshautMondays, open at 12. Get in line earlier, though, or all the produce will be sold and you will be tempted to produce-snatch from an octogenarian. Watch out for the hip-replacement checks. The retirees are there to score there mangoes and nothing will get in there way. While we were waiting in the parking lot before they opened the market we witnesses one spouse berating the other to hurry up--the old man was clearly limping too slowly and might be excess baggage in the heat of the market battle. We did end up getting good produce for about half the cost of what the Big Save had, but it wasn\'t a chill experience.

properties.name: Surfing for Kids by Unique Tch
properties.description: Posted by System 6571 Kawaihau Rd, Kapaa, HISurfing for Kids by Unique Tch (808) 346-0481

properties.name: coffee museum
properties.description: Posted by Jason  kaua\'i has transitioned many plantations from sugar cane to coffee. hwy 540 loops right through the middle of one of these, offering a little coffee museum and tasting center as a stopping point.

properties.name: poipu kiddie beach
properties.description: Posted by Jason  amazingly calm, shallow and sandy end of the beach is the obvious gathering spot for families who did their research. One of the few places you can really let the little ones just go for it. There is a deli and shave ice shop across the street, plenty of shade if you arrie early enough to snag a spot, and a playground with incredibly soft rubber flooring.

properties.name: salt pond beach
properties.description: Posted by Jason  the waves come up over a rock reef, creating a tiny waterfall into a 2 foot deep kiddie pond of fresh sea water. Shady grass nearby

properties.name: where jake lived for 3 months
properties.description: Posted by Jasonhunting wild boar with sharp sticks and ripping out non native plants
